title: Searching Team EUW MID/ADC Silver
body:
Hi,
Im Melle and started playing a year ago.
I started my first season recently and got into Silver now. Im willing to improve 
and search for Teammates who are ready to help me and get better. 
(Can speak german or english fluently without a strong accent)

Cheers, 
Melle aka. ColdHeart49
